mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tab_standard ORDER BY identifier LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_standard (guid, chineseName, foreignName, identifier, range, status, replaceInfo, adoptInfo, proposeCompany, draftCompany, draftPerson, occupyCompany, releaseHistory, useScope, attachment, keyword) VALUES(#{guid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chineseName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreignName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identifier, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{range, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replaceInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adoptInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposeCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{draftCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{draftPerson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupyCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseHistory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useScope, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attachment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tab_standard
chineseName = #{chineseName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
foreignName = #{foreignName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identifier = #{identifier, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
range = #{range, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
replaceInfo = #{replaceInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adoptInfo = #{adoptInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proposeCompany = #{proposeCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
draftCompany = #{draftCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
draftPerson = #{draftPerson, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occupyCompany = #{occupyCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
releaseHistory = #{releaseHistory, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
useScope = #{useScope, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment = #{attachment, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keyword = #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE guid = #{guid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
